content.title: Upcoming Webinars
description: ​The Ethics of Online Advertising and Marketing

In this presentation approved for one hour of legal ethics MCLE credit in California, Justia CEO Tim Stanley will share information to help demystify the ethical implications surrounding digital/online advertising for lawyers and law firms! We'll cover various ethical implications of digital legal marketing used to engage current clients and reach new clients.

content.title: Recent Recordings
description: ​Coming Soon: Digital and Traditional Marketing for Solo and Small Firms - From No Cost to Low Cost Effective, Practical, and Proven

Learn about effective marketing strategies for small law firms, combining digital and traditional approaches. Watch this on-demand presentation in which David Wolf, Partner at Wood, Atter & Wolf, P.A., provides practical guidance on how to promote your firm and create an impactful brand that brings in business.
Using ChatGPT & AI Tools for Writing Law Firm Marketing Content: The Good, The Bad, The Ugly

Want to learn more about how ChatGPT and other AI models can help your law firm create marketing content? Stream this on-demand presentation, as members of the Justia team explore how ChatGPT produces content, why lawyers should be mindful of factual inaccuracies in AI content, and more!
